headline: Compared to Estimates, FirstEnergy (FE) Q2 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: The headline numbers for FirstEnergy (FE) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended June 2025, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

raw.headline: Compared to Estimates, FirstEnergy (FE) Q2 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics

headline: FirstEnergy (FE) Tops Q2 Earnings Estimates
summary: FirstEnergy (FE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +4.00% and -1.00%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: FirstEnergy: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: AKRON, Ohio (AP) — FirstEnergy Corp. FE) on Wednesday reported second-quarter net income of $268 million. On a per-share basis, the Akron, Ohio-based company said it had net income of 46 cents.

raw.headline: FirstEnergy: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: AKRON, Ohio (AP) — FirstEnergy Corp. FE) on Wednesday reported second-quarter net income of $268 million. On a per-share basis, the Akron, Ohio-based company said it had net income of 46 cents.

headline: FirstEnergy Announces Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) today reported second quarter 2025 GAAP earnings of $268 million, or $0.46 per basic and diluted share, on revenue of $3.4 billion. This compares to second quarter 2024 GAAP earnings of $45 million, or $0.08 per basic and diluted share, on revenue of $3.3 billion. GAAP results include the impact of special items listed below.
